ing: 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 (5 ounce) jar KRAFT ROKA Blue Spread
des: "Take a trip down memory lane! This Classic ROKA Cheese Ball, studded with dried cranberries and chopped pecans, tastes as good as you remember."
ins:
Mix first 3 ingredients until well blended. Refrigerate 2 hours.
Shape into ball; coat with chopped pecans and dried cranberries.
Serve with crackers.
